Package com.github.tcn.plexi.paginators

Class Paginator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jagrosh.jdautilities.menu.Menu
      • com.github.tcn.plexi.paginators.Paginator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchPaginator, SearchSubmenu
    public abstract class Paginator
extends com.jagrosh.jdautilities.menu.Menu
    A frame for creating page-based menus from an emoji array and an EmbedBuilder array.


    This menu is strictly built to have interactions via emote reactions. As of right now, it does not have support for any form of interaction aside from that.

    This class extends jdaUtil's Menu class

    "Implementation Note:"
    The only abstract method that *MUST* be implemented is additionalReactionChecks(String emoteUnicode) if it does not return true for an emote, no action will be performed. Because of this, it MUST return true if not used

      • paginate

        public void paginate​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel channel,
                     int pageNum)
        Starts the pagination process by getting the requested page of the embed array and sends it to the designated channel. Also calls method that adds reactions
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel that the new Paginator should be sent
        pageNum - The page number that the Paginator should present

      • paginate

        public void paginate​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message message,
                     int pageNum)
        Starts the pagination process by getting the requested page of the embed array and replaces the designated Message's content with the new page.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to replace with the Paginator menu
        pageNum - The page number that the Paginator should display

      • pagination

        protected void pagination​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message message,
                          int pageNum)
        Waits for an event to happen and then reacts based upon that. First it calls checkReaction(MessageReactionAddEvent, long) which checks for reaction validity. Second it calls handleMessageReactionAddAction(MessageReactionAddEvent, Message, int) which handles the reaction. This method also starts a "timeout" counter that executes FINAL_ACTION when it expires.


        Parameters:
        message - The Message that contains the page we are currently on.
        pageNum - The index of the EMBED_ARRAYLIST we are currently on.

      • handleMessageReactionAddAction

        protected abstract void handleMessageReactionAddAction​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.react.MessageReactionAddEvent event,
                                                       net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message message,
                                                       int pageNum)
        An abstract class that is passed a MessageReactionAddEvent, Message, and integer and performs actions based upon which reaction was added. If child class has empty implementation, every valid reaction should cause the FINAL_ACTION to execute.
        Parameters:
        event - the MessageReactionAddEvent triggered by adding a reaction
        message - The Message that the reaction was added to
        pageNum - the page number that the Paginator is currently on

      • enterSubmenu

        protected abstract void enterSubmenu​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message oldMessage,
                                     int pageNum)
        An abstract method that allows a child class to enter a submenu if desired. If it has an empty implementation in the child class, the Paginator will simply be unable to enter a submenu.
        Parameters:
        oldMessage - The Message that contains the current Paginator
        pageNum - The Page number (index number) of EMBED_ARRAYLIST that the Paginator is currently showing
        "Implementation Note:"
        If there is no submenu, leave this method blank.

      • additionalReactionChecks

        protected abstract boolean additionalReactionChecks​(java.lang.String emoteUnicode)
        Allows a child class to run additional checks on an added emote before an assigned action is executed. If a reaction is found to be invalid, the method should return false. For anything else, it should return true.
        Parameters:
        emoteUnicode - The unicode form of an emote that is going to be checked. Example: "üëç"
        Returns:
        false if the MessageReactionAddEvent is invalid, true otherwise.

      • initialize

        protected void initialize​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.requests.RestAction<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message> action,
                          int pageNum)
        Adds reactions to Paginator.

        If there is more than one page denoted by MENU_PAGE_COUNT, then we add all reactions from REACTIONS.
        If there is only one page in that list, we call FINAL_ACTION and attempt to enter the submenu if one exists.

        Parameters:
        action - An action on a message. Usually a Message.editMessage(Message) action
        pageNum - The Page number (index number) of EMBED_ARRAYLIST that the Paginator is currently showing

      • changePage

        protected void changePage​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message originalMessage,
                          int newPageNum)
        Updates Paginator to show new page
        Parameters:
        originalMessage - The Message that contains the Paginator that needs edited
        newPageNum - The Page number (index number) of EMBED_ARRAYLIST that the Paginator needs to be edited to show
